column4: I'm looking for a USB to IDE adapter, something like this:  http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B000HJ99DI/ref=s9_k2a_gw_tr01?pf_rd_m=ATVPDKIKX0DER&pf_rd_s=center-2&pf_rd_r=10VG3VQ31GAPBB64RVVN&pf_rd_t=101&pf_rd_p=470938631&pf_rd_i=507846
Will this work in Ubuntu?  If not, what will?
Reason I ask is, it specifies Windows in the requirements on the amazon.com page.
